titleStmt.title: The perjur'd swain, or, The damsels bloody tragedy you loyal lovers now that hear this damsels destiny, sure can't forbear to shed a tear at this sad tragedy : the tune is, Sefautian's farewel / this may be printed, R.P.
titleStmt.author: R. P.

titleStmt.title: The perjur'd swain, or, The damsels bloody tragedy you loyal lovers now that hear this damsels destiny, sure can't forbear to shed a tear at this sad tragedy : the tune is, Sefautian's farewel / this may be printed, R.P.
titleStmt.author: R. P.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Blare, at the sign of the Looking-Glass on London-Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Place and date range of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
First line: As I rang'd for my recreation.
Text in three columns with woodcuts above first two.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
